${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:BaggedEscape.NAME: Bagged Escape
${modID}:BaggedEscape.DESCRIPTION: The next time you would receive 5 or more unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 5. NL Exhaust
${modID}:BaggedEscape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you would receive 5 or more unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 5. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Deworm.NAME: Deworm
${modID}:Deworm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status and curse in your hand, draw that many. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GodFather.NAME: Godfather
${modID}:GodFather.DESCRIPTION: Gain X strength and X dexterity.
${modID}:GodFather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 strength and X+1 dexterity.

${modID}:Grace.NAME: Grace
${modID}:Grace.DESCRIPTION: If you did not play any attack in a turn, retain your hand this turn

${modID}:Groom.NAME: Groom
${modID}:Groom.DESCRIPTION: Clear all negative effects. NL Exhaust NL Ethereal
${modID}:Groom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Clear all negative effects. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Hide.NAME: Hide
${modID}:Hide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn

${modID}:LaserEyes.NAME: Laser Eyes
${modID}:LaserEyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply !M! weak.

${modID}:MelodyAttack.NAME: Melody Attack
${modID}:MelodyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Make a random enemy lose !D! hp !M! times.

${modID}:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
${modID}:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! energy.

${modID}:ProfilePic.NAME: Profile Picture
${modID}:ProfilePic.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the first card you play each turn to your hand.

${modID}:Zoomie.NAME: Zoomie
${modID}:Zoomie.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Ball.NAME: Ball
${modID}:Ball.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard a card at random.
